name: FINDING_LOCATION
description: The major vessels and segments of a finding.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FINDING_VESSEL_ID
columns.description: Stores the major vessels of the finding.

columns.name: FINDING_SEGMENT_ID
columns.description: Stores the vessel segments of the finding.

columns.name: VESSEL_GRAFT_ID
columns.description: Stores the specific graft, branch, and sequence if the major vessel is on a graft.

columns.name: VESSEL_BRANCH_ID
columns.description: Stores the lesion branch that the major vessel belongs to.
